example.name: args 1 and 3
example.text: In this second of a trilogy aiming at an expos√© of contemporary business and social corruption of New York, Mr. Sinclair reveals the rottenness of Wall Street's high finance.

example.text: The "crooked" reference applies to their corruption of the court.
